name: Christmas Tri-Peaks Solitaire
description:
Tri-Peaks Solitaire is a super addictive card game, uses one deck and the goal is to clear three peaks made up of cards. This game requires skill and patience to win.

It really doesn't get any better than relaxing to a great game of TriPeaks Solitaire. Learn a new and fun variation on this awesome classic card game!
Download for free and enjoy!
